Uses of Package
game

Packages that use game
game   
ui   
 

Classes in game used by game
Bishop
          A class depicting the properties and functionality of the chess piece bishop
Board
          A class that defines the properties and functionalities of the game board.
Faction
          An enumeration listing the different available Factions, as well as providing methods for e.g. receiving different kinds of Pieces according to Faction and parsing Factions from Strings.
King
          A class depicting the chess piece King.
Knight
          A class depicting the chess piece Knight.
LoadException
          An exception thrown when loading a saved game proves unsuccesful.
Pawn
          A class depicting the chess piece Pawn.
Piece
          An abstract class providing with the default functions of all game pieces.
Queen
          A class depicting the chess piece Queen.
Rook
          A class that depicts the chess piece Rook.
SaveException
          An exception thrown when saving the game proves unsuccesful.
SpecialAbility
          An interface that contains the methods required for special abilities.
 

Classes in game used by ui
Board
          A class that defines the properties and functionalities of the game board.
Piece
          An abstract class providing with the default functions of all game pieces.
